entries.waiting_sell: Loading item into the market, please wait...
entries.bid_instant_sale_msg: Do you wish to purchase this item at the listed price?
entries.buy_successful_local: The item has been purchased.  If you have room in your inventory and the item is located in this region, it will be placed in your inventory automatically.  Otherwise, to retrieve the item, go to the correct region, click on the 'Available Items' tab, choose the item from the list, and press the button labeled 'Retrieve'.
entries.create_sale_successful: The item has been put up for sale.
entries.err_bid_invalid_auctioner: The bid failed because the auctioneer data was invalid.
entries.err_bid_invalid_container: The bid failed because the local commodity market is malfunctioning.
entries.err_bid_invalid_item: The bid failed because the item is invalid.
entries.err_bid_not_enough_money: You don't have enough money to place that bid.
entries.err_buy_invalid_auctioner: The purchase failed because the auctioneer is invalid.
entries.err_buy_invalid_item: The purchase failed because the item was invalid.
entries.err_buy_not_enough_money: You don't have enough money to buy that item.
entries.err_cancel_invalid_auctioner: You are not allowed to cancel that auction.
entries.err_cancel_invalid_item: You can't cancel that item because it is invalid.
entries.err_cancel_not_owner: You must be the owner of an item to cancel the sale.
entries.err_create_auction_already_auctioned: That item is already for sale.
entries.err_create_auction_invalid_auctioner: Auction failed because the auctioneer was invalid.
entries.err_create_auction_invalid_container: Auction failed because the local market is malfunctioning.
entries.err_create_auction_invalid_item: You cannot auction an invalid item.
entries.err_create_auction_invalid_length: You must specify a valid auction duration.
entries.err_create_auction_invalid_price: The specified auction price is invalid.
entries.err_create_auction_not_owner: You cannot auction an item you do not own.
entries.err_create_sale_already_auctioned: That item is already for sale.
entries.err_create_sale_invalid_auctioner: You cannot sell that item because the auctioneer is invalid.
entries.err_create_sale_invalid_container: Sale failed because the vendor is malfunctioning.
entries.err_craete_auction_invalid_item: You cannot sell an invalid item.
entries.err_create_sale_invalid_price: You must specify a valid sale price.
entries.err_retrieve_invalid_auctioner: You are not allowed to retrieve that item.
entries.err_retrieve_invalid_container: You cannot retrieve the item right now.
entries.err_retrieve_invalid_item: Please specify a valid item to retrieve.
entries.err_retrieve_not_owner: You cannot retrieve an item you do not own.
entries.err_sell_invalid_instant_price: Please specify a valid selling price.
entries.err_sell_invalid_min_bid: Please specify a valid minimum bid.
entries.err_sell_invalid_time: Please specify a valid auction duration.
entries.err_sell_no_item_selected: Please select an item to sell.
entries.err_vendor_sell_invalid_price: Please specify a sale price for the item.
entries.err_vendor_sell_no_item_selected: Please select an item to sell.
entries.err_vendor_terminal_no_owner: This vendor has not been initialized.
entries.waiting_accept_bid: Sending command to accept the bid.
entries.err_accept_bid_no_bids: There are currently no bids on this item
entries.err_retrieve_not_at_location_prose: You can't retrieve that item from this location. That item is located in the market at %TO.
entries.err_create_auction_unknown: An unknown error occurred while creating the auction.
entries.err_create_sale_unknown: An unknown error occurred while creating the sale.
entries.err_create_auction_not_enough_money_pros: You don't have enough credits to post that Auction. The Commodities Market requires %DI credits.
entries.err_create_sale_not_enough_money_prose: You don't have enough credits to post that Sale. The Commodities Market requires %DI credits.
entries.err_too_many_auctions: You have too many auctions on the commodities market.  Please withdraw some sales and pick up any items waiting in the Available Items tab.
entries.err_create_sale_invalid_item: You cannot sell an invalid item.
entries.err_create_sale_bid_too_high: Items can not be sold on the bazaar for more than %DI credits.
entries.err_create_auction_bid_too_high: Items can not be auctioned on the bazaar for more than %DI credits.
entries.err_bid_bid_too_high: The commodities market does not accept bids higher than %DI credits.
entries.help_vs_selling: Items for Sale in your Vendor.  You can view all items for sale at your vendors here.
entries.help_vs_filter_location: Vendor Location Filters.  You can choose to view items for sale at this vendor only, or all of your vendors in the Region, on the Planet, or in the Galaxy.
entries.help_vs_filter_type: Item Type Filter  Use this filter to choose what type of items for which to browse.
entries.help_vs_table: Items currently for sale in your vendor(s) are displayed here.  Double click on an item to view a detailed description of it.
entries.help_vs_new: Put a new item up for sale at this Vendor by pressing this button.
entries.help_vs_offers: This tab shows the items that have been offered for sale by other players.  You can choose to buy or reject any item on this list.  If you buy an item, it will be placed in your stockroom.  If you reject it, it will be returned to the player who originally offered it.
entries.help_vs_stock: Vendor Stock.  Use this tab to browse the items you have stored in the Stock of your vendor(s).  An item in your stockroom can be put up for sale in your vendors, or retrieved from the Stock and used.
entries.help_vb_selling: Items for Sale  This tab displays the Items currently for sale at this vendor.
entries.help_vb_filter_type: Item Type Filter  Use this to choose what type of items to show in the list.
entries.help_vb_table: Items currently for sale at this vendor are displayed here.  Double click on an item to view a detailed description of it.
entries.help_vb_buy: Buy the Selected Item by pressing this button.
entries.help_vb_offers: Items offered to this Vendor by you.  By offering an item for sale, you give the Vendor an opportunity to buy your item at the price you specify.  The owner of the Vendor will review your item and choose to buy it or reject it.  If the vendor owner rejects the item, you
entries.help_all: View All Sales  Using this tab, you can browse the Commodities market for Items which you can bid on or buy.
entries.help_all_filter_location: Commodities Market Location Filters  Use these filters to narrow or widen your search.  You can browse the Region for Items that can be bought and picked up here.  You can also browse by Planet or even the entire Galaxy.    If you purchase an item from a distant location you will need to travel to that location to pick up your new item.
entries.help_all_filter_type: Item Type Filter.  Use this filter to choose what type of items for which to browse.
entries.help_all_table: Items for sale or auction are displayed here.  Items for sale in the Commodities Market can be classified by sale type in two ways:  - Auction: Item item up for Auction can be bid on until the time runs out.  When the time runs out, the person with the highest bid gets the item.  - Instant Sale:  Items up for Instant Sale are available for purchase to the first person willing to pay the listed price.   Double click on an item to view a detailed description of it.
entries.help_all_bid: Buy or Bid on the Selected Item by pressing this button.
entries.help_bids: Bids Outstanding  View your currently Outstanding Bids using this tab.  You can watch your bids and bid higher if someone outbids you on an item.
entries.help_sales: Outstanding Sales  Use this tab to view items which you have placed for Sale on the Commodities Market.  You can use the information here to determine who is bidding on your items, and how much is being bid.  You can also cancel sales or accept the current high bid on any item.
entries.help_sales_new: Put one of your Items up for sale on the Commodities Market by pressing this button.
entries.help_available: Available Items  When you purchase an item, cancel a sale, or if one of your sales has expired, the item shows up here.  You can retrieve the item from the Market from here.  Please note that you must be in the same Market Region as the item in order to retrieve it.
entries.buy_successful_planet_prose: The item has been purchased.  To retrieve the item, click on the 'Available Items' tab, choose the item from the list, and press the button labeled 'Retrieve'.  You will first need to travel to %TT and access a Market Terminal there.
entries.buy_successful_galaxy_prose: The item has been purchased.  To retrieve the item, click on the 'Available Items' tab, choose the item from the list, and press the button labeled 'Retrieve'.  You will first need to travel to %TT, on %TO, and access a Market Terminal there.
entries.buy_vendor_owner_successful_local: The item has been purchased.  You can retrieve or sell the item by clicking on the 'Stockroom' tab.
entries.buy_vendor_owner_successful_remote: The item has been purchased.  You can retrieve or sell the item by clicking on the 'Stockroom' tab.  In order to retrieve the item, you will need to travel to the vendor which now has the item.
entries.buy_vendor_buyer_successful: The item has been purchased.  If you have room in your inventory, it will be placed there.  Otherwise, you may pick up the item later using the 'Available Items' tab.
entries.help_details_viewer: Item Details  Use this window to inspect an item in the Market.
entries.help_details_info: This panel shows information about the item, such as its name, type, who put it up for sale, and where the item is located.
entries.help_details_price: The item's price is displayed here, if the item is currently for sale.  If the item is up for auction, the current high bid is displayed.
entries.help_details_attribs: The Guaranteed Attributes of the item are shown here.
entries.help_details_desc: The description of the item, as provided by the seller, is displayed here.
entries.help_bid_high: Use this window to place a bid on an item.  This field displays the current high bid on the item.
entries.help_bid_proxy: Enter your Proxy Bid here.  The Proxy Bid is the limit to which the Auction system will automatically raise your bid.  Your bid is only automatically raised if you are out-bid by another player.
entries.err_sell_cannot_sell_intangible: You cannot sell this item.  The only data types that can be sold on the market are Manufacturing Schematics.
entries.help_sell_stockroom: This is the Selling Window.  It will allow you to sell the selected item from your Vendor Stock.
entries.help_sell_tabs: This is the Selling Window.  You can choose to sell an item from your inventory, or from your datapad, by using these tabs.
entries.help_sell_container: This is the container view of your inventory or datapad.  Select an item here to sell it.
entries.help_sell_info: Information about the item to sell is shown here.
entries.help_sell_stockroom_price: Specify the selling price of the item here.
entries.help_sell_instant: To sell the item as an Instant Sale, select this radio button and set the selling price.
entries.help_sell_auction: To sell the item in an Auction, select this radio button and set the minimum bid.
entries.help_sell_auction_time: If you are creating a new Auction, specify the duration of the Auction.  Once the auction duration expires, the item will be awarded to the highest bidder.
entries.help_sell_desc: Potential buyers will be able to see all the attributes of the item for sale.  You can add additional information here if desired.
entries.help_sell_ok: When you have configured the sale to your liking, press this button to create the sale.
entries.list_test_status_no_list: To request an item listing, hit the Refresh button.
entries.list_test_status_no_entries: No items found that meet the request criteria.
entries.list_test_status_no_list_filter: To request an item listing, select the desired filter parameters from the left, or hit the Refresh button.
entries.err_inventory_full: You have no room in your inventory to retrieve this item.
entries.err_cancel_auction_already_completed: That auction has already been completed.  It is too late to cancel.
entries.help_sell_auction_desc: To sell the item in an Auction, select this radio button and set the minimum bid.
entries.err_accept_bid_auction_already_complete: That auction is complete.  You cannot accept the high bid.
entries.err_retrieve_item_does_not_exist: This item cannot be retrieved because it no longer exists.
entries.err_retrieve_reimbursed: The item no longer exists.  Your bank has been reimbursed for the amount of the sale price of this item.
entries.err_vendor_deactivated: This vendor is currently deactivated and is not accepting new items to be placed up for sale or offer.  If you are the owner of this vendor, please make sure the maintenance fees for this vendor have been paid to reactivate the vendor.
entries.err_create_sale_in_trade: You cannot sell an item that you are trading.
entries.err_create_auction_in_crate: You cannot sell an item that is in a crate.
entries.err_create_auction_not_allowed: You are not allowed to sell that item.
entries.err_create_auction_not_empty: You can only sell empty containers.
entries.err_create_sale_not_empty: You can only sell empty containers.
entries.err_create_sale_not_allowed: You are not allowed to sell that item.
entries.err_create_sale_in_crate: You are not allowed to sell an item in a crate.
entries.err_create_auction_in_trade: You cannot sell an item that you are also trading.
entries.container_warning_prose: You are attempting to buy a container named "pcontrast1 %TT.".  The container's name does not necessarily reflect its contents.  Do not make this purchase unless you trust this seller.
entries.err_bid_outbid: The bid failed. You have been outbid.
entries.err_create_sale_too_many_vendors: You have more vendors than you can manage. You must either gain sufficient skill to manage the vendors you have, or remove one or more vendors before being allowed to place items for sale.
entries.err_create_sale_too_many_vendor_items: This vendor is at maximum capacity and cannot accept any more items for sale.
entries.err_create_sale_not_owner: You cannot sell an item you do not own.
entries.err_text_filter_token_too_small: All search terms must have a minimum length of %DI characters.
entries.help_vs_filter_text: Item Name Filter  Use this filter to further refine search results by only returning items that have names containing ALL the specified words and phrases.  Matches are only guaranteed for crafted items.
entries.help_all_filter_text: Item Name Filter  Use this filter to further refine search results by only returning items that have names containing ALL the specified words and phrases.  Matches are only guaranteed for crafted items.
entries.include_entrance_fee: Include Entrance Fee In Price Filter
entries.err_create_sale_is_biolinked: You cannot sell an item that is bio-linked.
entries.err_create_auction_is_biolinked: You cannot sell an item that is bio-linked.
entries.err_cannot_relist_offered_items: Some selected items cannot be relisted because they were bought as vendor offers and have never had a sell price set for them. You must use the Sell Item button/menu on these items to enter the sell price. The Sell window will display the offer price as the default sell price.
entries.err_create_auction_item_equipped: You cannot auction an item that is equipped.
entries.err_create_sale_item_equipped: You cannot sell an item that is equipped.
entries.tooltip_remove_all_filter_attribute: Remove all filters currently in the item attribute filter list.
entries.tooltip_remove_filter_attribute: Remove the currently selected filter from the item attribute filter list.
entries.tooltip_update_filter_attribute: Update the currently selected filter in the item attribute filter list with the filter condition specified to the right.  You must add or update the filter information to the item attribute filter list in order for it to be used.
entries.tooltip_add_filter_attribute: Add a new filter to the item attribute filter list using the filter condition specified to the right.  You must add or update the filter information to the item attribute filter list in order for it to be used.
entries.tooltip_required_attribute: If this checkbox is selected, the item must have the specified attribute defined or the filter condition will not match.  If this checkbox is not selected and the item does not have the specified attribute defined, the filter condition is not applicable and will be ignored.
entries.reject_restricted_item: The vendor cannot accept item of that type, or there is a contained item of an unacceptable type.
entries.err_create_sale_price_too_high: Items can not be sold on vendor for more than %DI credits.
entries.tooltip_match_all_any: All Match - will only match if all applicable attribute filter conditions match  Any Match - will only match if any applicable attribute filter condition matches  None Match - will only match if no applicable attribute filter condition matches  Any Not Match - will only match if any applicable attribute filter condition does not match
